thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by John

author: John
title: John
text:
I have recently used Alpha Flight Guru for the first time and was very impressed with the attention and responsiveness of my appointed "Guru" (Cris) but totally dismayed by the process of paying for the ticket.
I found the multiple transactions required (separate payments to each airline group involved plus the balance to AFG) really cumbersome and adding to the cost (as AFG used me as a funding source during the experience). Each of these transactions required a call requested by AFG to inform my bank of the incoming transaction in foreign currency. I probably spent one and a half hours on the phone over four calls to the bank - this is not a rewarding experience.
I have used online resources frequently in the past to purchase travel services and hopefully will again in the future. What I am used to is a single transaction between myself and the travel agency for all of the charges that I have incurred- simple.
In summary, thank you Cris for the work that you put in but I will be booking more flights with AFG when the current business model is consigned to the bin.
